Posts.Content: I was diagnosed with a breast papilloma with was also found to be ductal carcinoma insitu. I did not have clear margins after two lumpectomy's and had to have a mastectomy. I have found very little information on this type of malignancy. Even my surgeon had never seen it before. What does anyone know about this type of malignancy?
Posts.Title: malignant breast papilloma (dcis)
